versos: (samuel) "Then samuel took a stone and set it up between Mizpah and Shen. He named it Ebenezer, saying, 'Thus far the LORD has helped us.'" - 1 samuel 7:12 NIV;;;

(mark) Genesis 4:15 - "But the Lord said to him, 'Not so If anyone kills Cain, vengeance shall be taken on him sevenfold.' And the Lord put a mark on Cain, lest any who found him should attack him.";;;

(romans) romans 1:7 - "To all in Rome who are loved by God and called to be his holy people: Grace and peace to you from God our Father and from the Lord Jesus Christ.";;;
(titus) titus 1:4 - "To titus, my true son in our common faith: Grace and peace from God the Father and Christ Jesus our Savior.";;;
(peter) Matthew 16:16 - Simon peter answered, "You are the Messiah, the Son of the living God.";;;
(original) Ezekiel 27:17 - Judah and Israel traded with you; they exchanged wheat from Minnith, confections, honey, olive oil, and balm for your wares.;;;
